response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it's only fair to offer you the chance to own it at a special price tailored for individuals like yourself who appreciate its true worth. We propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right owner who will not only utilize the product to its full potential but also appreciate its significance. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
